summary: AIR BAG & AIR  CURTAIN ARE INOPERABLE DUE TO MASH SWITCH IN SEAT THAT CANNOT ACCOMMODATE A PASSENGER IN THE 100 LB. RANGE. BUICK CLAIMS THERE HANDS ARE TIED AND CANNOT MODIFY BECAUSE OF FEDERAL SAFETY GUIDELINES BUT THAT LEAVE THE RIGHT SIDE SAFETY ACCOMMODATIONS UNUSABLE AND DOES NOT PROTECT THE PASSENGER.  *NM
